Posts.Content: grannymush37 Hi Little Booboo I am like your self and a larger lady and I found the sports bras in Asda the large or Xtra large are good they dont give you the same support as the underwires but they are ok and nice and soft and cheap at Â£6 each. Good luck with all your surgery and hope it all goes well for you.x hi I have got several of these bras from asda they are lovely and comfortable and a great price as well xx
Posts.Title: Post surgery sports bras
